mapper.select: select a.user_no, b.user_name, count(a.att_date) AS 출석횟수 from att_tb a, user_tb b where a.user_no=b.user_no group by b.user_name,a.user_no order by a.user_no;
select count(*) from att_tb where user_no =#{user_no} and to_char(att_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')= to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')
select count(*) from att_tb where user_no =#{user_no}
